name: XShares Advisors LLC
overview: XShares Advisors LLC, a registered investment advisor, designs and sponsors U.S.-listed exchange traded funds (ETFs). The company also partners with top financial services firms and index providers to launch innovative ETFs. This flexible approach to fund development makes XShares Advisors unique among U.S.-based providers, allowing the company to introduce novel ETFs based on in-house intellectual property while also creating private label opportunities for firms seeking to enter the fast-growing ETF marketplace.

funds.name: Exchange Traded Funds
funds.source_description: XShares raises $10M for exchange traded funds despite struggle
